metadata.title: CVE-2024-11234 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In PHP versions 8.1.* before 8.1.31, 8.2.* before 8.2.26, 8.3.* before8.3.14, when using streams with configured proxy and "request_fulluri"option, the URI is not properly sanitized which can lead to HTTP requestsmuggling and allow the attacker to use the proxy to perform arbitrary HTTPrequests originating from the server, thus potentially gaining access toresources not normally available to the external user.

criterions.comment: php8.1 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
